channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【The crawl before the fall… of referrals: understanding AI’s impact on content providers】跌倒前的爬行……推荐机制的影响：理解人工智能对内容提供者的影响
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Radar now shows how often a given AI model sends traffic to a site relative to how often it crawls that site. This helps site owners make decisions about which AI bots to allow or block. 】 Cloudflare Radar now shows how often a given AI model sends traffic to a site relative to how often it crawls that site. This helps site owners make decisions about which AI bots to allow or block.

item.title: 【How TimescaleDB helped us scale analytics and reporting】时间序列数据库如何帮助我们扩展分析和报告
item.description: 【 Cloudflare chose TimescaleDB to power its Digital Experience Monitoring and Zero Trust Analytics products. 】Cloudflare选择TimescaleDB来支持其数字体验监控和零信任分析产品。

item.title: 【Content Independence Day: no AI crawl without compensation!】内容独立日：没有补偿，不许AI抓取！
item.description: 【 It’s Content Independence Day: Cloudflare, along with a majority of the world's leading publishers and AI companies, is changing the default to block AI crawlers unless they pay creators for content. 】它标志着内容独立日：Cloudflare，以及全球大多数领先的出版商和人工智能公司，正在将默认设置更改为阻止人工智能爬虫，除非它们为内容支付给创作者。

item.title: 【Hyper-volumetric DDoS attacks skyrocket: Cloudflare’s 2025 Q2 DDoS threat report】超体积DDoS攻击激增：Cloudflare 2025年第二季度DDoS威胁报告
item.description: 【 June was the busiest month for DDoS attacks in 2025 Q2, accounting for nearly 38% of all observed activity. 】6月是2025年第二季度DDoS攻击最繁忙的月份，占所有观察到活动的近38%。

item.title: 【Introducing pay per crawl: Enabling content owners to charge AI crawlers for access】引入按爬取付费：使内容所有者能够对AI爬虫的访问收费
item.description: 【 Pay per crawl is a new feature to allow content creators to charge AI crawlers for access to their content. 】按次爬取是一项新功能，允许内容创作者对其内容的访问向AI爬虫收费。

item.title: 【Cloudflare recognized as a Visionary in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms】Cloudflare 被列为 2025 年 Gartner® 魔力象限™ SASE 平台的愿景者
item.description: 【 Gartner has recognized Cloudflare as a Visionary in the 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms report. 】Gartner已将Cloudflare列为2025年Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for SASE Platforms报告中的愿景者。

item.title: 【Control content use for AI training with Cloudflare’s managed robots.txt and blocking for monetized content】使用 Cloudflare 的托管 robots.txt 和付费内容阻止功能来控制内容使用以用于人工智能训练
item.description: 【 Cloudflare is making it easier for publishers and content creators of all sizes to prevent their content from being scraped for AI training by managing robots.txt on their behalf. 】Cloudflare 正在使所有规模的出版商和内容创作者更容易防止他们的内容被用于人工智能训练，方法是代表他们管理 robots.txt。

item.title: 【From Googlebot to GPTBot: who’s crawling your site in 2025】从Googlebot到GPTBot：2025年谁在爬取您的网站
item.description: 【 From May 2024 to May 2025, crawler traffic rose 18%, with GPTBot growing 305% and Googlebot 96%. 】从2024年5月到2025年5月，爬虫流量增长了18%，其中GPTBot增长了305%，Googlebot增长了96%。

item.title: 【Quicksilver v2: evolution of a globally distributed key-value store (Part 1)】闪电侠v2：全球分布式键值存储的演进（第一部分）
item.description: 【 This blog post is the first of a series, in which we share our journey in redesigning Quicksilver — Cloudflare’s distributed key-value store that serves over 3 billion keys per second globally. 】这篇博文是系列文章的第一篇，我们将分享重新设计Quicksilver——Cloudflare的分布式键值存储系统——的历程，该系统在全球每秒处理超过30亿个键。

item.title: 【Introducing simple and secure egress policies by hostname in Cloudflare’s SASE platform】通过主机名在Cloudflare的SASE平台中引入简单且安全的出站策略
item.description: 【 Cloudflare's SASE platform now offers egress policies by hostname, domain, content category, and application in open beta. 】Cloudflare的SASE平台现在在公开测试版中提供基于主机名、域名、内容类别和应用程序的出口策略。
